p: Owing to its technological development, the emulsified systems containing essential oil, remain a challenge due to the volatility and instabilities and solubility of essential oil.[ 13] In this way, the development of emulsions as carriers of essential oils demonstrates several benefits such as the ability to hide unpleasant flavors so they can be administered in a palatable form, and also to improve the oral bioavailability.[ 14 15] Additionally, emulsions are widely used in cosmetic and pharmaceutical formulations due to excellent topical administration of hydrophilic and lipophilic active ingredients.[ 16]
